subject: Softball
lead_paragraph: Stacey Nuveman continued emerging from a prolonged slump by hitting a home run and starting another rally with a double as the United States beat China, 7-0, in an exhibition game in Oklahoma City. The game was stopped after five innings because of the run rule. Jennie Finch narrowly missed a perfect game when Li Chun Xia grounded a single through the left side with two outs in the fifth.
